title: IThreadFeatureData.Pitch
description: Gets or sets the pitch of the thread helix of this thread feature.
returns: 0.0 < Pitch of the helix; default is determined by interrogating the selected configuration's profile sketch
remarks:
Specify either a value or an equation that starts with an equal sign (=).
This property is valid only if
IThreadFeatureData::PitchOverride
is set to true.
